segments.text: I see the water just pouring out of the sink, and the mom doesn’t even care.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She’s just standing there, drying that plate like nothing is happening.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can’t believe she hasn’t turned off the faucet yet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is going to ruin the cabinets and the floor if she doesn’t do something soon.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if she’s just ignoring it or if she really doesn’t see it.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The kids are being sneaky, but honestly, the water is the bigger problem right now.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope she doesn’t slip and fall because of all that water.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She’s so focused on that plate, it’s like she’s in another world.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel like shouting at her to wake up and pay attention.
segments.speaker: PAR
